description.value:
Special: Accurate, Overheats

Note: Each consecutive turn after the first the wielder fires this weapon at the same time and hits, the weapon gains an additional +2 Damage and Penetration, up to +10. Missing or losing line of sight the wielder must start over. One step easier to obtain if offered by a Stryxis Merchant.
